thread.title_full: Amazing location, friendly staff - Review of Novotel Beijing Peace, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Paul C
title: Amazing location, friendly staff
text: This was the perfect base for our four nights in Beijing. Our corner room was clean, quiet and comfortable, with great views of the hutongs nearby. Breakfast and drinks in the lounge were great, with views towards the Forbidden City. The staff were super friendly and helpful.
